title: Project Jhin Ultimate Music
body:
After seeing a preview of the project Jhin skin, the music played during the ultimate caught my attention. I REALLY like the dramatic/synth vibe it has and was wondering if the sound designers behind the skin could consider posting the full track. If anybody hasn't heard it yet, here is a link to parts of it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJyfaqJqEM8 

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey Mid Narcissist,

I wrote the music for this year's Project, including Project Jhin's music. You're in luck, here's the track I wrote to create the ult music!

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-jhin-neon-cherry-blossoms](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-jhin-neon-cherry-blossoms)

Enjoy!

Ed the Conqueror
